Also, this was done by 🇨🇦Canadian short track speed skating team at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics(2018)in South Korea. This Korean athlete stole this move, which means he also thinks the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics are unfair. He brought shame on the Korean people.
